data.title: Rock of Ages
data.meta_description: It’s the tail end of the big, bad 1980s in Hollywood, and the party has been raging hard
data.text:
Estimate the Cost of

Your License

Start planning your production with a cost estimate you can save and share with your team. Just answer a few questions.

This estimator is only for non-Equity/amateur productions. Equity/professional customers should contact the Licensing department directly at [email protected].

Important:

The cost quoted is an estimate only and may differ when you apply for a license.

It’s the tail end of the big, bad 1980s in Hollywood, and the party has been raging hard. Aqua Net, Lycra, lace and liquor flow freely at one of the Sunset Strip’s last legendary venues, a place where sex machine Stacee Jaxx takes the stage and scantily clad groupies line up to turn their fantasies into reality. Amidst the madness, aspiring rock star (and resident toilet cleaner) Drew longs to take the stage as the next big thing (and longs for small-town girl Sherri, fresh off the bus from Kansas with stars in her eyes). But the rock ’n’ roll fairy tale is about to end when German developers sweep into town with plans to turn the fabled Strip into just another capitalist strip mall. Can Drew, Sherri and the gang save the strip – and themselves – before it’s too late? Only the music of hit bands Styx, Journey, Bon Jovi, Whitesnake and more hold the answer.

Rock of Ages is also ready to rock for YOUTH and TEENS!

Act I

1. “Cum On Feel the Noize / Just Like Paradise / Nothin’ But A Good Time” – Company

2. “Sister Christian” – Father, Mother, Sherrie, Drew, Franz, Ensemble

2a. Wail to the Chief – Band

3. “We Built This City / Too Much Time On My Hands” – Hertz, Regina, Mayor, Franz, Lonny, Dennis, Stacee, Ensemble

3a. “Heaven 1” – Drew

4. “I Wanna Rock” – Drew, Ensemble

4a. “Heaven 2” – Drew

5. “We’re Not Gonna Take It” – Regina, Protestors, Ensemble

5a. “Heaven 3” – Drew

6. “More Than Words / To Be With You / Heaven 4” – Sherrie, Waitress #1, Drew, Ensemble

6a. “Waiting for a Girl Like You” – Drew, Sherrie, Stacee, Ensemble

6b. Dead or Alive Intro – Band

7. “Dead or Alive” – Stacee, Ensemble

7a. Renegade U/S – Band

8. “I Want to Know What Love Is” – Stacee, Sherrie, Ensemble

8a. Heaven U/S – Band

9. “Cum On Feel the Noize / We’re Not Gonna Take It (Reprise)” – Company

10. “Harden My Heart / Shadows of the Night” – Sherrie, Justice, Women, Men

11. “Here I Go Again” – Company

Act II

12. “The Final Countdown” – Dennis, Lonny, Hertz, Franz, Regina, Ensemble

12a. “Heading Towards Venus: Scene Change” – Band, Justice, Strippers, Men

13. “Pour Some Sugar On Me / I Wanna Rock / Rock of Ages Medley” – Justice, DJ, Sherrie, Drew, Ja’Keith, Strippers, Men

13a. “We’re Not Gonna Take It (Reprise 2)” – Regina, Protestors

13b. Dennis’s Oscar Moment – Band

13c. Rock Candy U/S – Band

13d. Hangin’ Bluff – Band

14. “High Enough” – Sherrie, Drew, Ensemble

14a. Beaver Hunt – Prerecorded

14b. Kiss Me Deadly U/S – Band

15. “I Hate Myself For Loving You / Heat of the Moment” – Sherrie, Stacee, Drew, Ensemble

15a. Hate Myself Transition – Band

16. “Hit Me With Your Best Shot” – Franz, Regina, Hertz, Protestors

16a. I Can't Fight Transition – Band

17. “I Can’t Fight This Feeling” – Lonny, Dennis, Solo Female, Women, Men

17a. Still Can’t Fight (Transition) – Band

18. “Every Rose Has Its Thorn” – Company

18a. “Keep On Lovin’ You” – Hertz

19. “Oh, Sherrie” – Drew, Sherrie, Ensemble (Offstage)

20. “The Search is Over” – Drew, Sherrie, Ensemble

20a. The Search is Over U/S – Band

21. “Renegade” – Stacee, Ensemble

21a. Dennis is Dead – Band

22. “Don’t Stop Believin’” – Company

23. Bows – Company
